attributes.action: PROVIDE MORE FUNDING FOR CHILDRENS HOSPICES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, the government provides very little funding for childrens hospices. These hospices are vital for young children with life threatning and terminal illnesses.Therefore the Government needs to ensure that the funding for the childrens hospices is drastically increased. Please sign the petition and help create greater funding.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Hospice-Funding/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
